Detailed Description

template<class Elt, CurveID ID>
class e2c2::Curve< Elt, ID >

Base "class" (really class template) for Edwards Curves.

Curve

Template Parameters:
Elt field element
ID id of curve
Collects all relevant information about the curve and provides basic functionality
